City: On Big Star Lake, near Ba
trends: There have been no other sightings in On Big Star Lake, near Ba
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsi was fishing in a rowboat with my two daughters before, during and after thesighting. we were fishing in big star lake. big star lake is along the southedge of lake county. the boat was anchored about 150 from the north shore. wedid not experience any strange sensations. my reaction was, "thats reallyweird." since we were on vacation, i hadnt had a chance to contact anyone. the following is a more detailed description obtained by rich mcvannel viatelephone:the sighting occured at approximately 8:45 pm. ___ and his daughters werefishing on the north end of big star lake, near baldwin. while fishing theyheard a noise to the north and looked and viewed a military jet flying and theydidnt think anything of it, as the planes from grayling air national guard basefly over that area all the time. when they saw what it was, they watched it fora few moments and they turned back to the south tofish more and noticed a "white cylindrical object" due south from their positionat some distance away. as they watched this new object, the object moved south,slow at first and then "zipped away" southerly and disappeared. it exhibitednot sound and no exhaust, it was very bright and then it was gone.about ten minutes later, the object reappeared a little closer this time, satstill momentarily and then "zipped" off to the south and disappeared again. about ten minutes later, again, the object reappears closer this time. ___figures about 1 1\4 miles south of the south shore of big star lake. this timethe object flashes and looks larger and then developes into a bright "sphere"shape ("looked like a ball and then back to the cylinder shape"), and thecylinder appeared to be rolling counter-clockwise moving away from them. theobject was so bright that he thought it was the sun glaring off of it, but thesun had gone down by this time and they were viewing it in the lighter eveningsky before darkness fell. while the object was rolling, it appeared to have adark spot in themiddle of it and also, when it changed back to the cylinder shape it looked likea canoe, "you know, with both ends turned up". (digital drawings included withreport). in other words the object was rolling like a log and the black spotappeared in the middle of the rolling cylinder, as seen in the drawings. theobject kept rolling south and disappeared like before. they followed it withtheir eyes until the bright little dot of what was left of it in the distance,disappeared.what was most outstanding about the object was the fact that it didnt have any"crisp edges". the edges always appeared fuzzy and never clear.the primary adult witness doesnt wear glasses, has good sight. his onedaughter has corrected vision with glasses. the adult witness is a tv producer\director.
